SwitchPreference.android:title: USB port 1 (Type C USB)
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Type C USB port near the power port
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: Type C USB port near the power port

SwitchPreference.android:title: USB Port 2 (Type A USB)
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Type A USB port that supports 24V
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: Type A USB port that supports 24V

SwitchPreference.android:title: USB Port 3 (Type A USB)
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Type A USB port near the power USB port
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: Type A USB port near the power USB port

SwitchPreference.android:title: USB Port 4 (Type A USB)
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Type A USB port near the power USB port
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: Type A USB port near the power USB port

SwitchPreference.android:title: USB Port 5 (Type A USB)
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Type A USB port on the upper right side
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: Type A USB port on the upper right side

SwitchPreference.android:title: USB Port 6 (Type A USB)
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOn: Type A USB port on the lower right side
SwitchPreference.android:summaryOff: Type A USB port on the lower right side
